title: getStopWords
desc: Gets array of ([stop words](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stop_words)), by either using a default, or reading from a file.

params.name: lib
params.description: which library stopword list to load

params.name: lang
params.description: The language to be used, based on [ISO 639-1 codes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes). For example: English='en'.

params.name: fileLoc
params.description: path to file that contains list of stop words (1 word per line)

params.name: merge
params.description: Whether to merge list from file with file from library
